targets.expr: (container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""} *100)  / on(pod,container) (container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""})

(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="airflow-in-prod-use1", pod=~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""} *100)  / on(pod,container) (container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="airflow-in-prod-use1", pod=~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""})

(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="$namespace", pod=~"airflow-.*", pod!~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""} *100)  / on(pod,container) (container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"airflow-.*",  pod!~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""})

(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{ namespace="airflow-in-prod-use1", pod=~"airflow-.*", pod!~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""} *100)  / on(pod,container) (container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="airflow-in-prod-use1", pod=~"airflow-.*",  pod!~"airflow-scheduler.*", container != ""})

panels.description: Whether the scheduler is UP or DOWN

targets.expr: max(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{namespace="$namespace", deployment="airflow-scheduler"})

panels.title: Airflow Scheduler Status

targets.expr: max(kube_deployment_spec_replicas{namespace="$namespace", deployment="airflow"})
max(aiflow_connection_pool_open_slots{environment="$environment"}) by (pool_name)
max(aiflow_connection_pool_used_slots{environment="$environment"}) by (pool_name)
max(aiflow_connection_pool_starving_tasks{environment="$environment"}) by (pool_name)
max(aiflow_connection_pool_starving_tasks{environment="airflow-prod"}) by (pool_name)
avg(aiflow_executor_open_slots{environment="$environment"})
avg(aiflow_executor_running_tasks{environment="$environment"})
avg(aiflow_executor_queued_tasks{environment="$environment"})
avg(aiflow_executor_open_slots{environment="airflow-prod"})
